qas.question: What was planned by Denmark Vesey?
When was Vesey's plan for a slave revolt revealed?
How many slaves were executed with Vesey?
What revolution made whites fearful of retribution of slaves?
What wasn't planned by Denmark Vesey?
When wasn't Vesey's plan for a slave revolt revealed?
How many slaves were spared with Vesey?
What revolution made blacks fearful of retribution of slaves?

context: By 1820, Charleston's population had grown to 23,000, maintaining its black (and mostly slave) majority. When a massive <a0_0><b5_0>slave revolt<b5_0/><a0_0/> planned by Denmark Vesey, a free black, was revealed in <a1_0><b6_0>May 1822<b6_0/><a1_0/>, whites reacted with intense fear, as they were well aware of the violent retribution of slaves against whites during the <a4_0><b9_0>Haitian Revolution<b9_0/><a4_0/>. Soon after, Vesey was tried and executed, <a2_0><b7_0>hanged<b7_0/><a2_0/> in early July with <a3_0><b8_0>five slaves<b8_0/><a3_0/>. Another 28 slaves were later hanged. Later, the state legislature passed laws requiring individual legislative approval for manumission (the freeing of a slave) and regulating activities of free blacks and slaves.
